TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content: Moved for you, MrChumley.

Could this one be removed? I created a thread about Beauty Shots and didn't know that there was another one.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/134729-Show-us-yout-Beauty-Shots-from-KSP%21
Can't delete a thread with replies, but I have locked it for you, Pedro_daher.
Could I get the SSp thread temporarily locked? I have full support from Sampa, and he will tell you the same.

Could I get the SSp thread temporarily locked? I have full support from Sampa, and he will tell you the same.

Sorry, we only honor the requests from OPs for locking. Sampa must request it, we can't take someone else's word for it.
Okay, I'll have him send one.
Hey, could i please have SSP thread locked temporarily while we get. Our act together?
Okay done, let us know when you're ready to re-open it.
Thanks.
Could you remove my "TEXTURES WANTED" thread in the texturing and modelling discussion? It should be the thread at the top...
Removed for you, ThatGuyWithALongUsername.
Can you guys move my CST 100 mod to the release section?
I can and I did.

Hello everyone! Sorry to bother you, but I've had an outdated poll on this thread for about 4 months now I think... Could an admin remove it?

SPPCC v0.11 - Spaceplane Color Corrections

I'm sorry I don't have another picture of my cat pic you guys this time, so have a picture of a
gigantic frog
instead.

Edited October 1, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

Moved for you, Sigma88.

I don't have the permissions to remove a poll, sp1989, one of the admins will have to do that.
I have removed the poll for you.

There's a challenge I've been running that I don't have time for anymore, but one of the participants has volunteered to take it over.

Is it possible to get the first post of this thread (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132274-FAR-Fighter-Challenge-BD-Armory-AI) transferred from the control of myself to the user SpaceplaneAddict so that they can continue to maintain the leaderboard?

There's a challenge I've been running that I don't have time for anymore, but one of the participants has volunteered to take it over.

Is it possible to get the first post of this thread (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132274-FAR-Fighter-Challenge-BD-Armory-AI) transferred from the control of myself to the user SpaceplaneAddict so that they can continue to maintain the leaderboard?

Well, he does not have any old enough posts, I recommend that he posts a new thread and copy over the OP.

You should then place a redirection link on your OP and request us to close the thread.

A link to the old thread at the bottom of the new one would also be good.

Moved for you, Sigma88.

I don't have the permissions to remove a poll, sp1989, one of the admins will have to do that.

Thanks RIC!

could you move this one as well? (to the addon releases subforum)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135899

thanks again!
Moved for you, Sigma88.

Well, he does not have any old enough posts, I recommend that he posts a new thread and copy over the OP.

You should then place a redirection link on your OP and request us to close the thread.

A link to the old thread at the bottom of the new one would also be good.

Thanks, done. The old thread (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132274-FAR-Fighter-Challenge-BD-Armory-AI) is ready to be locked.
